characters: Multiple pedestrians, including a child and an adult, and a cyclist. The child is on the right side of the image, the adult is on the left side, and the cyclist is on the right side.
summary: The video sequence shows several instances of 'ghost probing' behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly emerges from the right side of the image, darting into the road from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, an adult pedestrian suddenly appears from the left side of the image, crossing the road from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a cyclist emerges from the right side of the image, entering the road from behind a parked vehicle.
actions: The child on the right side of the image suddenly runs into the road, the adult on the left side of the image suddenly crosses the road, and the cyclist on the right side of the image suddenly enters the road.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, pedestrians, and a cyclist.
